subtitleNullable: Market fires reported in Nigerian newspapers since the beginning of 2019 to 2020
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I got bored and started logging fires on16th February. I didn't expect a long list but it kept getting longer. 


### Content

Inside is an excel summary of my search on Nairaland for mentions of market fires. Enjoy.


### Acknowledgements

Initial Version By me. 
Updated 17-Feb-2020 by Jibola Lawal:
-Added columns 
---Src link 
---Recurring 
---Quantification of amount of damage 
-Cleaned up local governments 
-Added new entry - Nsukka Timber Market fire 


### Inspiration
I would love to see someone do a deep dive eventually and suggest a lasting solution to market fires in Nigeria.
